column1: A Mass of Christian Burial will be celebrated Wednesday June17
column2: 12:00pm in St. Mary of Mt. Carmel Parish
column3: Church of St. Joseph's 226 French St.
column4: Hammonton. Burial will follow in Holy Sepulchre Cemetery. A viewing will be held Wednesday 10:00am until 11:30am at the Carnesale Funeral Home
